ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Airiayanna Lytesoul here been playing Eq for over a year now very much addicted as of right now there are three puters in my house two for eq and one for
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Airiayanna Lytesoul here been playing Eq for
over a year now very much addicted as of right now
there are three puters in my house two for eq and one
for everthing else sometimes i catch my self playing
2 chars at once hehe <br>Longest streak playin
27hours 42min straight thru <br><br>i have called off of
work when the clan has posted a raid<br><br>make my
fiancee cancel plans so that i can play<br><br>so think i
am addicted<br><br>Airiayanna Lytesoul<br>Goddess
Healer chic<br>Bertoxx searver<br>level 40 cleric
